### Problem 1

```{r, message = FALSE}

  tibble(

    vec_log = vec_num > 0,
    vec_char = character(length = 10),
    vec_fac = factor(
      c("1", "2", "3", "3", "2", "1", "1", "1", "2", "3")
    )
  )
df1
```
